word: We hope that the work for the soldiers will go forward. Several are interested, and those in charge of the home recognize the good work that is being done. I fully believe that some of these old men, perhaps many, will be saved. I wish that all our people could see the many doors that are open before them.-- Letter 112, June 21, 1903, to Elder and Mrs. J. A. Burden, while laboring in Australia.
